name: updateEntity
description: Update an entity's details such as name, primary image, or module location.

entityId.description: The unique identifier of the entity to update.

moduleId.description: The unique identifier of the module to update.

primaryImageId.description: The unique identifier of the image to set as primary.

newName.description: Optional new name for the entity.

explainer.description: Explain what action is going to be taken in a human readable sentence. Examples: 'Renaming the entity from Sunset to Sunset Beach', 'Setting a new primary image for the entity Sunset Beach'.
